attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these difficult times, with wage cuts in both the public and private sector, isn’t it time the leaders of the country acted like leaders and reduced their salary, this may only be a temporary decrease but it would surely send out the right message to the country. I don’t think for a minute that any of the political parties MPs will agree to a wage cut, which may explain why the majority of people in the country from all walks of life think politicians are just self serving "snout in the trough" hypocrites

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
